text: Samuel Scott Olens (born July 8, 1957) is an American lawyer and politician. He was the Attorney General of Georgia from 2011 to 2016. He is the first Jew to win a statewide, partisan race in Georgia. He resigned as attorney general to become president of Kennesaw State University. ==References== ==Other websites== *Georgia Attorney General Sam Olens official state government site *Sam Olens at Project Vote Smart Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Georgia (U.S. state) attorneys general Category:Politicians from Miami Category:Lawyers from Miami Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Jewish American politicians
title: Sam Olens
